thread.title: Deal: Step up your charging game with these discounted QC 3.0 chargers
thread.title_full: Deal: Step up your charging game with these discounted QC 3.0 chargers

author: Bogdan Petrovan
title: Deal: Step up your charging game with these discounted QC 3.0 chargers
text:
Having too many devices to charge is a good problem to have, right? That said, if keeping everything juiced up becomes a hassle, one of the best solutions is to get a USB charger with multiple ports, preferably one that supports fast charging.
For all charging-port-challenged folks out there, we have a couple of great deals on Quick Charge 3.0 wall chargers.
First up, you can get a well-reviewed USB Type-C 6-port wall charger for $10 off, a good deal on a device that normally sells for close to $30. You get one USB Type-C port, one Q.C 3.0 USB port, and four regular ones, ensuring that you can power up just about any device in your home. This is a Qualcomm-certified product, so safety issues shouldn’t crop up. Just enter promo code ZTT8FXNZ at checkout to get your $10 discount.
$19.99 on Amazon with code ZTT8FXNZ If you don’t need a Type-C port, you can also opt for the 5-port version, which can be had for $17.99, with the same promo code ZTT8FXNZ applied.
$17.99 on Amazon with code ZTT8FXNZ One last thing to know is that the seller has a full refund warranty policy if you’re not satisfied with your purchase. These deals are usually limited, so make up your mind quickly if you’re interested.
Happy shopping!
